law.catch_line: The owner of the vehicle, if present in the vehicle, or, in his absence, the driver of the vehicle i...
law.text:
The owner of the vehicle, if present in the vehicle, or, in his absence, the driver of the vehicle is presumed to be responsible for any violation of §§ 24-106 through 24-106.2 of this subtitle, if:
The violation is caused by an occupant of the vehicle;
The vehicle has two or more occupants; and
It cannot be determined which occupant is the violator.
